summary: A penniless, skirt-chasing Italian nobleman finds love and scandal when he travels to New York City.
cast: Rudolph Valentino|Nita Naldi|Casson Ferguson|Gertrude Olmstead|Hector V. Sarno|Claire de Lorez|Eileen Percy|Lillian Langdon|Henry A. Barrows|Rosa Rosanova|Michael Dark|Sayre Dearing|Bud Geary|George Hickman|Paul Porcasi|Natacha Rambova
title: Cobra
